name: Jumps
description: Enter a world of sky islands and jump your way to the finish, you must complete each level with a certain amount of jumps! and HURRY, you must complete each world in under a certain amount of time.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32-bit Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1gb VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: Unless your computer is a potato, you'll be able to run this game.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: 3 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM
